Items.Title: Oversight - Ensuring Timely Payments for Nonprofits and Human Service Providers.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Ensuring Timely Payments for Nonprofits and Human Service Providers.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a task force to examine disparities in contracting
Items.MatterName: Establishing a task force to examine disparities in contracting.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing wage requirements for city-contracted human services workers
Items.MatterName: Establishing wage requirements for city-contracted human services workers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.7638.B/A.8091.B, providing that certain purchase contracts to purchase food can be awarded to a qualified bidder who complies with certain standards when such bid is not more than 10% higher than the lowest responsible bidder.
Items.MatterName: Certain purchase contracts to purchase food can be awarded to a qualified bidder who complies with certain standards when such bid is not more than 10% higher than the lowest possible bidder (S.7638-B/A.8091-B).
